column1: Little Goat Diner////I was just in the neighborhood at 3pm
column3: but this place was so inviting that I decided to pop in. It has a bright and relaxing brunch place feel with giant windows. I ordered the pork belly pancake. The food was creative and the pork belly was delicious. I thought the pancake itself is too buttery and salty. I love Asian scallion pancakes and also western fluffy pancakes
column4: but this pancake is an awkward middle ground that is not entirely pleasing. The music was also way too loud there. My overall experience was fine
column5: probably because I didn't have to wait a second for the table. I would not wait long for a table there though
column6: especially given the amount of options around.
